ERR_COMMAND: Could not understand your command, please try again!
CREDITS: Created by Potor10#3237, Contributions from Ult#0001
NO_ACCESS: You can not access this command until you link your Discord to a Project Sekai account. Use /link to begin.

LEADERBOARD.BAD_RANGE_ERR: Error! Please choose a rank within the range of 1 to 100

LINK.DISCORD_LINKED_ERR: Error! Your Discord account is already linked to a Project Sekai account.
LINK.SEKAI_LINKED_ERR: Error! That Project Sekai account is already linked to another Discord account.
LINK.LINK_SUCC: Success! Your account is now linked.
LINK.EXPIRED_CODE_ERR: Error! Your link code has expired
LINK.GEN_ERR: Error! Invalid code on Project Sekai profile
LINK.NO_CODE_ERR: Error! Please request a link code first.
LINK.NO_SEKAI_ERR: Error! This Project Sekai account is not linked to any Discord account.
LINK.NO_DISCORD_LINK: Error! This Discord account is not linked to any Project Sekai account.
LINK.UNLINK_SUCC: Success! Your account is now unlinked.
